summary: This mod adds a new perk to the smithing tree \"Legendary Smithing\" that allows you to reforge a number of quest awarded items to one you would normally have received at a later level.
descriptionHtml:
SM Leveled Item Smithing
Created By the Strategy Master
----------------------------------------------
This mod adds a new perk to the smithing tree \"Legendary Smithing\" that allows you to reforge a number of quest awarded items to one you would normally have received at a later level.

The options for such reforging will only appear if you are of the expected level and you have the item in your inventory.

Note a reforge to a later level will remove any previous bonuses from using the grindstone or worktable.

List of leveled Items
-------------------------------------------
Chillrend
Dragonbane
Gauldur Blackblade
Gauldur Blackbow
Nightingale Weapons
The Pale Blade
Nightingale Armor
Shield of Solitude
Mages Circlet
Amulet of Articulation

Compatability
-------------------------------------------
- Will likely conflict with other mods that modify the smithing perk tree.


Version History
-------------------------------------------
v1.1
- Only leveled items you have in your inventory will now show up at the forge.

v1.0
- Release
author: Strategy Master
